name: realm
description: Realm is a mobile database: an alternative to SQLite and key-value stores

scripts.rebuild-changes: node-pre-gyp rebuild --debug && cd tests && npm install
scripts.license-check: npm install && license-checker --exclude "MIT,ISC,BSD,Apache-2.0,BSD-2-Clause,BSD-3-Clause,WTFPL,Unlicense,(MIT AND CC-BY-3.0)" | node scripts/handle-license-check.js
scripts.jsdoc: npm install && npm run jsdoc:clean && jsdoc -u docs/tutorials -p package.json -c docs/conf.json
scripts.prenode-tests: npm install --build-from-source=realm && cd tests && npm install
scripts.node-tests: cd tests && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test-runner:ava: cd tests/test-runners/ava && npm install --build-from-source=realm && npm test
scripts.test-runner:mocha: cd tests/test-runners/mocha && npm install --build-from-source=realm && npm test
scripts.test-runner:jest: cd tests/test-runners/jest && npm install --build-from-source=realm && npm test
scripts.test-runners: npm run test-runner:ava && npm run test-runner:mocha && npm run test-runner:jest
scripts.testMac: npm run isMac -s && echo this is mac || echo .
scripts.alias:win:revert: git config alias.rm-symlink "" && git config alias.rm-symlinks "" && git config alias.checkout-symlinks ""
scripts.win-fix-symlinks: npm run isWin -s && npm run alias:win:apply && git checkout-symlinks && git rm-symlinks || echo .
scripts.win-revert-symlinks: npm run isWin -s &&  npm run alias:win:apply && git checkout-symlinks && npm run alias:win:revert || echo .
scripts.prereact-tests-android: npm run isWin -s && npm run win-fix-symlinks || echo .
